articles.description: England face India in the first Test at Headingley - follow live scores, radio commentary, video highlights and updates.
articles.title: England vs India cricket LIVE: First Test, day five, Headingley - score, commentary, highlights & updates

articles.description: An emotional Emma Raducanu produces an impressive fightback to reach the Eastbourne second round and continue her Wimbledon preparations.
articles.title: Emotional Emma Raducanu battles back to beat Ann Li and progress at Eastbourne

articles.description: Ben Duckett's magnificent 149 leads England to chase down 371 and beat India by five wickets in a thrilling final day of the first Test at Headingley.
articles.title: England vs India: Ben Duckett the hero in all-time Headingley classic

articles.description: Paris St-Germain boss Luis Enrique compares the pitches at the Club World Cup to "an NBA court full of holes".
articles.title: Club World Cup: Paris St-Germain's Luis Enrique criticises pitch

articles.description: The British and Irish Lions players have rallied around their foreign-born team-mates, after Australia coach Joe Schmidt highlighted the ancestry of some of the tourists' squad.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions: Finn Russell defends 'southern-hemisphere' Lions

articles.description: Follow live text and listen to BBC local radio commentaries from day three of the latest round of the 2025 County Championship.
articles.title: County Championship LIVE: Day three - scores, radio commentary & live text

articles.description: BBC Sport F1 correspondent Andrew Benson answers your latest questions before the Austrian Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 Q&A: Ferrari, Mercedes, the FIA, F1 in Africa and drivers in danger of losing seat for 2026

articles.description: Chelsea striker Nicolas Jackson is given a two-match ban for his red card in Friday's 3-1 Club World Cup defeat by Flamengo.
articles.title: Chelsea: Nicolas Jackson given two-game ban for red card against Flamengo

articles.description: The All England Club is set to honour a promise to construct a statue of Sir Andy Murray at Wimbledon and hope to unveil it in 2027.
articles.title: Andy Murray: Wimbledon statue of British tennis great earmarked for All England Club in 2027

articles.description: Coach Steve Borthwick says he will allow Owen Farrell to settle back into life at Saracens this summer, rather than calling him up for an immediate return to England duty.
articles.title: Owen Farrell: England did not consider summer tour call-up
